1{-# LANGUAGE OverloadedStrings #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Retrieve via HTTP.
5module Koshucode.Baala.Base.IO.Http
6  ( HttpProxy,
7    httpGet, httpGetDoc,
8    httpExceptionSummary,
9  ) where
10
11import qualified Control.Exception                  as Ex
12import qualified Data.ByteString.Lazy               as Bz
13import qualified Network.HTTP.Conduit               as H
14import qualified Network.HTTP.Types.Status          as H
15import qualified Network.URI                        as U
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture           as O
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Prelude       as B
18
19-- | Pair of protocol name and proxy URI.
20type HttpProxy = (String, Maybe O.IOPath)
21
22-- | Get HTTP content as lazy bytestring.
23--   If request succeeded as 200 OK,
24--   returns lazy-bytestring content in 'Right' part,
25--   otherwise, returns status code and message in 'Left' part.
26--
27--   >>> httpGet [] "https://httpbin.org/robots.txt"
28--   Right "User-agent: *\nDisallow: /deny\n"
29--
30--   >>> (print O.#. httpGet []) O.<#!> ((\c -> "http://httpbin.org/status/" ++ show c) <$> [400 .. 404 :: Int])
31--   Left (400, "BAD REQUEST")
32--   Left (401, "UNAUTHORIZED")
33--   Left (402, "PAYMENT REQUIRED")
34--   Left (403, "FORBIDDEN")
35--   Left (404, "NOT FOUND")
36--
37httpGet :: [HttpProxy] -> O.IOPath -> IO (Either (Int, String) O.Bz)
38httpGet proxies uri =
39    do req <- requestFromURI proxies uri
40       catchHttpException $ do
41         man <- H.newManager H.tlsManagerSettings
42         res <- H.httpLbs req man
43         return $ case H.responseStatus res of
44           H.Status code msg
45               | code == 200 -> Right $ H.responseBody res
46               | otherwise   -> Left (code, B.bsString msg)
47
48-- | Get HTTP content wrapped in @\<document\>@ tag.
49--
50--   >>> httpGetDoc [] "https://httpbin.org/robots.txt"
51--   Right "<document id=\"https://httpbin.org/robots.txt\"\r\n>User-agent: *\nDisallow: /deny\n</document>\r\n"
52--
53httpGetDoc :: [HttpProxy] -> O.IOPath -> IO (Either (Int, String) O.Bz)
54httpGetDoc proxies uri =
55    do result <- httpGet proxies uri
56       return (doc <$> result)
57    where
58      doc bz = Bz.concat [ "<document id=\""
59                         , B.stringBz $ escapeUri uri, "\"\r\n>"
60                         , bz, "</document>\r\n"]
61
62-- | Escape URI.
63escapeUri :: O.Map String
64escapeUri = U.escapeURIString U.isAllowedInURI
65
66requestFromURI :: [HttpProxy] -> O.IOPath -> IO H.Request
67requestFromURI proxies uriText =
68    do req <- H.parseRequest uriText
69       case U.parseURI uriText of
70         Nothing  -> return req
71         Just uri -> do let proxy = selectProxy proxies uri
72                        return $ add proxy req
73    where 
74      add :: Maybe O.IOPath -> O.Map H.Request
75      add proxy req = B.fromMaybe req $ do
76          proxy'    <- proxy
77          uri       <- U.parseURI proxy'
78          auth      <- U.uriAuthority uri
79          let host'  = B.stringBs $ U.uriRegName auth
80              port   = uriPortNumber $ U.uriPort auth
81          Just $ H.addProxy host' port req
82
83uriPortNumber :: String -> Int
84uriPortNumber (':' : n) = B.fromMaybe defaultPortNumber $ O.tInt n
85uriPortNumber _         = defaultPortNumber
86
87defaultPortNumber :: Int
88defaultPortNumber = 80
89
90selectProxy :: [HttpProxy] -> U.URI -> Maybe O.IOPath
91selectProxy proxies uri =
92    do let scheme = U.uriScheme uri
93       proxy <- lookup scheme proxies
94       proxy
95
96catchHttpException :: O.Map (IO (Either (Int, String) O.Bz))
97catchHttpException = ( `Ex.catch` handler ) where
98    handler (H.HttpExceptionRequest _ (H.StatusCodeException res _))
99              = return $ Left (httpStatus res)
100    handler e = return $ Left (0, httpExceptionSummary e)
101
102-- | Status code and message.
103httpStatus :: H.Response body -> (Int, String)
104httpStatus res = case H.responseStatus res of
105                   H.Status code msg -> (code, B.bsString msg)
106
107-- | Text message of HTTP exception.
108httpExceptionSummary :: H.HttpException -> String
109httpExceptionSummary (H.InvalidUrlException _ _)  = "Invalid URL"
110httpExceptionSummary (H.HttpExceptionRequest _ e) = httpExceptionContent e
111
112httpExceptionContent :: H.HttpExceptionContent -> String
113httpExceptionContent e = case e of
114    H.StatusCodeException res _             -> snd $ httpStatus res
115    H.TooManyRedirects    _                 -> "Too many redirects"
116    H.OverlongHeaders                       -> "Overlong headers"
117    H.ResponseTimeout                       -> "Response timeout"
118    H.ConnectionTimeout                     -> "Connection timeout"
119    H.ConnectionFailure _                   -> "Connection failure"
120    H.InvalidStatusLine _                   -> "Invalid status line"
121    H.InvalidHeader _                       -> "Invalid header"
122    H.InternalException _                   -> "Internal exception"
123    H.ProxyConnectException _ _ _           -> "Proxy connection error"
124    H.NoResponseDataReceived                -> "No response data received"
125    H.TlsNotSupported                       -> "TLS not supported"
126    H.WrongRequestBodyStreamSize _ _        -> "Wrong request body"
127    H.ResponseBodyTooShort _ _              -> "Response body too short"
128    H.InvalidChunkHeaders                   -> "Invalid chunk headers"
129    H.IncompleteHeaders                     -> "Incomplete headers"
130    H.InvalidDestinationHost _              -> "Invalid destination host"
131    H.HttpZlibException _                   -> "Zlib error"
132    H.InvalidProxyEnvironmentVariable _ _   -> "Invalid proxy env"
133    H.ConnectionClosed                      -> "Closed"
134
